Did you know?

We provide budget estimates for venues to help you make an informed decision.

**Budget Estimate Includes:**

  * Venue Rental Costs
  * Food & Beverage Costs
  * Taxes and Other Fees



Our Spot Estimate tool helps plan for a budget that works best for you. Try it by pricing out a venue you like!

[Award WinnerCheney MansionOak Park, IL | ChicagoIf you desire a wedding venue that is elegant, distinctive and timeless, look no further than historic Cheney Mansion.Starting at **$4,500** for **50** GuestsPrice venuePrice venue](/venue/2852/cheney-mansion/)

[Embassy Suites by Hilton Scottsdale ResortScottsdale, AZ | Phoenix/ScottsdaleOverlooking Camelback Mountain in the heart of Scottsdale, Embassy Suites by Hilton Scottsdale Resort is just minutes from championship golf courses, spa facilities, shopping, dining, art galleries, MStarting at **$7,042** for **50** GuestsPrice venuePrice venue](/venue/9609/embassy-suites-by-hilton-scottsdale-resort/)

[Georgia International Horse ParkConyers, GA | AtlantaFor equestrians, horse-lovers, and all who appreciate simple Southern elegance, the Georgia International Horse Park boasts several venues for a refined, fabulous affair.Starting at **$3,326** for **50** GuestsPrice venuePrice venue](/venue/14305/georgia-international-horse-park/)

[Humphreys Half Moon InnSan Diego, CA | San DiegoDiscover an intimate wedding destination in a tropical paradise right here in San Diego at Humphreys Half Moon Inn on Shelter Island.Starting at **$6,419** for **50** GuestsPrice venuePrice venue](/venue/1947/humphreys-half-moon-inn/)

[Award WinnerThe Woodlands at AlgonkianSterling, WA | EverettThe Woodlands at Algonkian provides a beautifully natural setting for a picturesque wedding on 850 acres of parkland in Northern Virginia.Starting at **$7,562** for **50** GuestsPrice venuePrice venue](/venue/809/the-woodlands-at-algonkian/)
